alert.note: Alert for Converse (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 09 at 8:05PM MDT until September 10 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM MDT FOR WEST CENTRAL CONVERSE COUNTY... At 804 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Rolling Hills, or 26 miles northeast of Casper, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Converse County. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 154 and 168. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
